1. Yamakavaggo.1: Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayā;\nManasā ce paduṭṭhena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;\nTato naṃ dukkhamanveti, cakkaṃva vahato padaṃ.
1. Yamakavaggo.2: Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayā;\nManasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;\nTato naṃ sukhamanveti, chāyāva anapāyinī [anupāyinī (ka.)].
1. Yamakavaggo.3: Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini [ajinī (?)] maṃ ahāsi me;\nYe ca taṃ upanayhanti, veraṃ tesaṃ na sammati.
1. Yamakavaggo.4: Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me;\nYe ca taṃ nupanayhanti, veraṃ tesūpasammati.
1. Yamakavaggo.5: Na hi verena verāni, sammantīdha kudācanaṃ;\nAverena ca sammanti, esa dhammo sanantano.
1. Yamakavaggo.6: Pare ca na vijānanti, mayamettha yamāmase;\nYe ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā.
1. Yamakavaggo.7: Subhānupassiṃ viharantaṃ, indriyesu asaṃvutaṃ;\nBhojanamhi cāmattaññuṃ, kusītaṃ hīnavīriyaṃ;\nTaṃ ve pasahati māro, vāto rukkhaṃva dubbalaṃ.
1. Yamakavaggo.8: Asubhānupassiṃ viharantaṃ, indriyesu susaṃvutaṃ;\nBhojanamhi ca mattaññuṃ, saddhaṃ āraddhavīriyaṃ;\nTaṃ ve nappasahati māro, vāto selaṃva pabbataṃ.
1. Yamakavaggo.9: Anikkasāvo kāsāvaṃ, yo vatthaṃ paridahissati;\nApeto damasaccena, na so kāsāvamarahati.
1. Yamakavaggo.10: Yo ca vantakasāvassa, sīlesu susamāhito;\nUpeto damasaccena, sa ve kāsāvamarahati.
1. Yamakavaggo.11: Asāre sāramatino, sāre cāsāradassino;\nTe sāraṃ nādhigacchanti, micchāsaṅkappagocarā.
1. Yamakavaggo.12: Sārañca sārato ñatvā, asārañca asārato;\nTe sāraṃ adhigacchanti, sammāsaṅkappagocarā.
1. Yamakavaggo.13: Yathā agāraṃ ducchannaṃ, vuṭṭhī samativijjhati;\nEvaṃ abhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, rāgo samativijjhati.
1. Yamakavaggo.14: Yathā agāraṃ suchannaṃ, vuṭṭhī na samativijjhati;\nEvaṃ subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, rāgo na samativijjhati.
1. Yamakavaggo.15: Idha socati pecca socati, pāpakārī ubhayattha socati;\nSo socati so vihaññati, disvā kammakiliṭṭhamattano.
1. Yamakavaggo.16: Idha modati pecca modati, katapuñño ubhayattha modati;\nSo modati so pamodati, disvā kammavisuddhimattano.
1. Yamakavaggo.17: Idha tappati pecca tappati, pāpakārī [pāpakāri (?)] ubhayattha tappati;\n‘‘Pāpaṃ me kata’’nti tappati, bhiyyo [bhīyo (sī.)] tappati duggatiṃ gato.
1. Yamakavaggo.18: Idha nandati pecca nandati, katapuñño ubhayattha nandati;\n‘‘Puññaṃ me kata’’nti nandati, bhiyyo nandati suggatiṃ gato.
1. Yamakavaggo.19: Bahumpi ce saṃhita [sahitaṃ (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)] bhāsamāno, na takkaro hoti naro pamatto;\nGopova gāvo gaṇayaṃ paresaṃ, na bhāgavā sāmaññassa hoti.

2. Appamādavaggo.21: Appamādo amatapadaṃ [amataṃ padaṃ (ka.)], pamādo maccuno padaṃ;\nAppamattā na mīyanti, ye pamattā yathā matā.
2. Appamādavaggo.22: Evaṃ [etaṃ (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)] visesato ñatvā, appamādamhi paṇḍitā;\nAppamāde pamodanti, ariyānaṃ gocare ratā.
2. Appamādavaggo.23: Te jhāyino sātatikā, niccaṃ daḷhaparakkamā;\nPhusanti dhīrā nibbānaṃ, yogakkhemaṃ anuttaraṃ.
2. Appamādavaggo.24: Uṭṭhānavato satīmato [satimato (sī. syā. ka.)], sucikammassa nisammakārino;\nSaññatassa dhammajīvino, appamattassa [apamattassa (?)] yasobhivaḍḍhati.
2. Appamādavaggo.25: Uṭṭhānenappamādena, saṃyamena damena ca;\nDīpaṃ kayirātha medhāvī, yaṃ ogho nābhikīrati.
2. Appamādavaggo.26: Pamādamanuyuñjanti, bālā dummedhino janā;\nAppamādañca medhāvī, dhanaṃ seṭṭhaṃva rakkhati.
2. Appamādavaggo.27: Mā pamādamanuyuñjetha, mā kāmaratisanthavaṃ [sandhavaṃ (ka)];\nAppamatto hi jhāyanto, pappoti vipulaṃ sukhaṃ.
2. Appamādavaggo.28: Pamādaṃ appamādena, yadā nudati paṇḍito;\nPaññāpāsādamāruyha, asoko sokiniṃ pajaṃ;\nPabbataṭṭhova bhūmaṭṭhe [bhummaṭṭhe (sī. syā.)], dhīro bāle avekkhati.
2. Appamādavaggo.29: Appamatto pamattesu, suttesu bahujāgaro;\nAbalassaṃva sīghasso, hitvā yāti sumedhaso.
2. Appamādavaggo.30: Appamādena maghavā, devānaṃ seṭṭhataṃ gato;\nAppamādaṃ pasaṃsanti, pamādo garahito sadā.
2. Appamādavaggo.31: Appamādarato bhikkhu, pamāde bhayadassi vā;\nSaṃyojanaṃ aṇuṃ thūlaṃ, ḍahaṃ aggīva gacchati.
2. Appamādavaggo.32: Appamādarato bhikkhu, pamāde bhayadassi vā;\nAbhabbo parihānāya, nibbānasseva santike.\nAppamādavaggo dutiyo niṭṭhito.

3. Cittavaggo.33: Phandanaṃ capalaṃ cittaṃ, dūrakkhaṃ [durakkhaṃ (sabbattha)] dunnivārayaṃ;\nUjuṃ karoti medhāvī, usukārova tejanaṃ.
3. Cittavaggo.34: Vārijova thale khitto, okamokataubbhato;\nPariphandatidaṃ cittaṃ, māradheyyaṃ pahātave.
3. Cittavaggo.35: Dunniggahassa lahuno, yatthakāmanipātino;\nCittassa damatho sādhu, cittaṃ dantaṃ sukhāvahaṃ.
3. Cittavaggo.36: Sududdasaṃ sunipuṇaṃ, yatthakāmanipātinaṃ;\nCittaṃ rakkhetha medhāvī, cittaṃ guttaṃ sukhāvahaṃ.
3. Cittavaggo.37: Dūraṅgamaṃ ekacaraṃ [ekacāraṃ (ka.)], asarīraṃ guhāsayaṃ;\nYe cittaṃ saṃyamessanti, mokkhanti mārabandhanā.
3. Cittavaggo.38: Anavaṭṭhitacittassa, saddhammaṃ avijānato;\nPariplavapasādassa, paññā na paripūrati.
3. Cittavaggo.40: Kumbhūpamaṃ kāyamimaṃ viditvā, nagarūpamaṃ cittamidaṃ ṭhapetvā;\nYodhetha māraṃ paññāvudhena, jitañca rakkhe anivesano siyā.
3. Cittavaggo.41: Aciraṃ vatayaṃ kāyo, pathaviṃ adhisessati;\nChuddho apetaviññāṇo, niratthaṃva kaliṅgaraṃ.
3. Cittavaggo.42: Diso disaṃ yaṃ taṃ kayirā, verī vā pana verinaṃ;\nMicchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, pāpiyo [pāpiyaṃ (?)] naṃ tato kare.
3. Cittavaggo.43: Na taṃ mātā pitā kayirā, aññe vāpi ca ñātakā;\nSammāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, seyyaso naṃ tato kare.\nCittavaggo tatiyo niṭṭhito.

4. Pupphavaggo.44: Ko imaṃ [komaṃ (ka.)] pathaviṃ vicessati [vijessati (sī. syā. pī.)], yamalokañca imaṃ sadevakaṃ;\nKo dhammapadaṃ sudesitaṃ, kusalo pupphamiva pacessati [pupphamivappacessati (ka.)].
4. Pupphavaggo.45: Sekho pathaviṃ vicessati, yamalokañca imaṃ sadevakaṃ;\nSekho dhammapadaṃ sudesitaṃ, kusalo pupphamiva pacessati.
4. Pupphavaggo.46: Pheṇūpamaṃ kāyamimaṃ viditvā, marīcidhammaṃ abhisambudhāno;\nChetvāna mārassa papupphakāni [sapupphakāni (ṭīkā)], adassanaṃ maccurājassa gacche.
4. Pupphavaggo.47: Pupphāni heva pacinantaṃ, byāsattamanasaṃ [byāsattamānasaṃ (ka.)] naraṃ;\nSuttaṃ gāmaṃ mahoghova, maccu ādāya gacchati.
4. Pupphavaggo.48: Pupphāni heva pacinantaṃ, byāsattamanasaṃ naraṃ;\nAtittaññeva kāmesu, antako kurute vasaṃ.
4. Pupphavaggo.49: Yathāpi bhamaro pupphaṃ, vaṇṇagandhamaheṭhayaṃ [vaṇṇagandhamapoṭhayaṃ (ka.)];\nPaleti rasamādāya, evaṃ gāme munī care.
4. Pupphavaggo.50: Na paresaṃ vilomāni, na paresaṃ katākataṃ;\nAttanova avekkheyya, katāni akatāni ca.
4. Pupphavaggo.51: Yathāpi ruciraṃ pupphaṃ, vaṇṇavantaṃ agandhakaṃ;\nEvaṃ subhāsitā vācā, aphalā hoti akubbato.
4. Pupphavaggo.52: Yathāpi ruciraṃ pupphaṃ, vaṇṇavantaṃ sugandhakaṃ [sagandhakaṃ (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)];\nEvaṃ subhāsitā vācā, saphalā hoti kubbato [sakubbato (sī. pī.), pakubbato (sī. aṭṭha.), sukubbato (syā. kaṃ.)].
4. Pupphavaggo.53: Yathāpi puppharāsimhā, kayirā mālāguṇe bahū;\nEvaṃ jātena maccena, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahuṃ.
4. Pupphavaggo.54: Na pupphagandho paṭivātameti, na candanaṃ tagaramallikā [tagaramallikā (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)];\nSatañca gandho paṭivātameti, sabbā disā sappuriso pavāyati.
4. Pupphavaggo.55: Candanaṃ tagaraṃ vāpi, uppalaṃ atha vassikī;\nEtesaṃ gandhajātānaṃ, sīlagandho anuttaro.
4. Pupphavaggo.56: Appamatto ayaṃ gandho, yvāyaṃ tagaracandanaṃ [yāyaṃ tagaracandanī (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)];\nYo ca sīlavataṃ gandho, vāti devesu uttamo.
4. Pupphavaggo.57: Tesaṃ sampannasīlānaṃ, appamādavihārinaṃ;\nSammadaññā vimuttānaṃ, māro maggaṃ na vindati.
4. Pupphavaggo.58: Yathā saṅkāraṭhānasmiṃ [saṅkāradhānasmiṃ (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)], ujjhitasmiṃ mahāpathe;\nPadumaṃ tattha jāyetha, sucigandhaṃ manoramaṃ.
4. Pupphavaggo.59: Evaṃ saṅkārabhūtesu, andhabhūte [andhībhūte (ka.)] puthujjane;\nAtirocati paññāya, sammāsambuddhasāvako.\nPupphavaggo catuttho niṭṭhito.

5. Bālavaggo.60: Dīghā jāgarato ratti, dīghaṃ santassa yojanaṃ;\nDīgho bālānaṃ saṃsāro, saddhammaṃ avijānataṃ.
5. Bālavaggo.61: Carañce nādhigaccheyya, seyyaṃ sadisamattano;\nEkacariyaṃ [ekacariyaṃ (ka.)] daḷhaṃ kayirā, natthi bāle sahāyatā.
5. Bālavaggo.62: Puttā matthi dhanammatthi [puttamatthi dhanamatthi (ka.)], iti bālo vihaññati;\nAttā hi [attāpi (?)] attano natthi, kuto puttā kuto dhanaṃ.
5. Bālavaggo.63: Yo bālo maññati bālyaṃ, paṇḍito vāpi tena so;\nBālo ca paṇḍitamānī, sa ve ‘‘bālo’’ti vuccati.
5. Bālavaggo.64: Yāvajīvampi ce bālo, paṇḍitaṃ payirupāsati;\nNa so dhammaṃ vijānāti, dabbī sūparasaṃ yathā.
5. Bālavaggo.65: Muhuttamapi ce viññū, paṇḍitaṃ payirupāsati;\nKhippaṃ dhammaṃ vijānāti, jivhā sūparasaṃ yathā.
5. Bālavaggo.66: Caranti bālā dummedhā, amitteneva attanā;\nKarontā pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, yaṃ hoti kaṭukapphalaṃ.
5. Bālavaggo.67: Na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, yaṃ katvā anutappati;\nYassa assumukho rodaṃ, vipākaṃ paṭisevati.
5. Bālavaggo.68: Tañca kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, yaṃ katvā nānutappati;\nYassa patīto sumano, vipākaṃ paṭisevati.
5. Bālavaggo.69: Madhuvā [madhuṃ vā (dī. ni. ṭīkā 1)] maññati bālo, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati;\nYadā ca paccati pāpaṃ, bālo [atha bālo (sī. syā.) atha (?)] dukkhaṃ nigacchati.
5. Bālavaggo.70: Māse māse kusaggena, bālo bhuñjeyya bhojanaṃ;\nNa so saṅkhātadhammānaṃ [saṅkhatadhammānaṃ (sī. pī. ka.)], kalaṃ agghati soḷasiṃ.
5. Bālavaggo.71: Na hi pāpaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ, sajju khīraṃva muccati;\nḌahantaṃ bālamanveti, bhasmacchannova [bhasmāchannova (sī. pī. ka.)] pāvako.
5. Bālavaggo.72: Yāvadeva anatthāya, ñattaṃ [ñātaṃ (?)] bālassa jāyati;\nHanti bālassa sukkaṃsaṃ, muddhamassa vipātayaṃ.
5. Bālavaggo.73: Asantaṃ bhāvanamiccheyya [asantaṃ bhāvamiccheyya (syā.), asantabhāvanamiccheyya (ka.)], purekkhārañca bhikkhusu;\nĀvāsesu ca issariyaṃ, pūjā parakulesu ca.
5. Bālavaggo.74: Mameva kata maññantu, gihīpabbajitā ubho;\nMamevātivasā assu, kiccākiccesu kismici;\nIti bālassa saṅkappo, icchā māno ca vaḍḍhati.

6. Paṇḍitavaggo.76: Nidhīnaṃva pavattāraṃ, yaṃ passe vajjadassinaṃ;\nNiggayhavādiṃ medhāviṃ, tādisaṃ paṇḍitaṃ bhaje;\nTādisaṃ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
6. Paṇḍitavaggo.77: Ovadeyyānusāseyya, asabbhā ca nivāraye;\nSatañhi so piyo hoti, asataṃ hoti appiyo.
6. Paṇḍitavaggo.78: Na bhaje pāpake mitte, na bhaje purisādhame;\nBhajetha mitte kalyāṇe, bhajetha purisuttame.
6. Paṇḍitavaggo.79: Dhammapīti sukhaṃ seti, vippasannena cetasā;\nAriyappavedite dhamme, sadā ramati paṇḍito.
6. Paṇḍitavaggo.80: Udakañhi nayanti nettikā, usukārā namayanti [damayanti (ka.)] tejanaṃ;\nDāruṃ namayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti paṇḍitā.
6. Paṇḍitavaggo.81: Selo yathā ekaghano [ekagghano (ka.)], vātena na samīrati;\nEvaṃ nindāpasaṃsāsu, na samiñjanti paṇḍitā.
6. Paṇḍitavaggo.82: Yathāpi rahado gambhīro, vippasanno anāvilo;\nEvaṃ dhammāni sutvāna, vippasīdanti paṇḍitā.
6. Paṇḍitavaggo.83: Sabbattha ve sappurisā cajanti, na kāmakāmā lapayanti santo;\nSukhena phuṭṭhā atha vā dukhena, na uccāvacaṃ [noccāvacaṃ (sī. aṭṭha.)] paṇḍitā dassayanti.
6. Paṇḍitavaggo.84: Na attahetu na parassa hetu, na puttamicche na dhanaṃ na raṭṭhaṃ;\nNa iccheyya [nayicche (pī.), nicche (?)] adhammena samiddhimattano, sa sīlavā paññavā dhammiko siyā.
6. Paṇḍitavaggo.85: Appakā te manussesu, ye janā pāragāmino;\nAthāyaṃ itarā pajā, tīramevānudhāvati.
6. Paṇḍitavaggo.86: Ye ca kho sammadakkhāte, dhamme dhammānuvattino;\nTe janā pāramessanti, maccudheyyaṃ suduttaraṃ.
6. Paṇḍitavaggo.87: Kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ vippahāya, sukkaṃ bhāvetha paṇḍito;\nOkā anokamāgamma, viveke yattha dūramaṃ.
6. Paṇḍitavaggo.88: Tatrābhiratimiccheyya, hitvā kāme akiñcano;\nPariyodapeyya [pariyodāpeyya (?)] attānaṃ, cittaklesehi paṇḍito.

7. Arahantavaggo.90: Gataddhino visokassa, vippamuttassa sabbadhi;\nSabbaganthappahīnassa, pariḷāho na vijjati.
7. Arahantavaggo.91: Uyyuñjanti satīmanto, na nikete ramanti te;\nHaṃsāva pallalaṃ hitvā, okamokaṃ jahanti te.
7. Arahantavaggo.92: Yesaṃ sannicayo natthi, ye pariññātabhojanā;\nSuññato animitto ca, vimokkho yesaṃ gocaro;\nĀkāse va sakuntānaṃ [sakuṇānaṃ (ka.)], gati tesaṃ durannayā.
7. Arahantavaggo.93: Yassāsavā parikkhīṇā, āhāre ca anissito;\nSuññato animitto ca, vimokkho yassa gocaro;\nĀkāse va sakuntānaṃ, padaṃ tassa durannayaṃ.
7. Arahantavaggo.94: Yassindriyāni samathaṅgatāni [samathaṃ gatāni (sī. pī.)], assā yathā sārathinā sudantā;\nPahīnamānassa anāsavassa, devāpi tassa pihayanti tādino.
7. Arahantavaggo.95: Pathavisamo no virujjhati, indakhilupamo [indakhīlūpamo (sī. syā. ka.)] tādi subbato;\nRahadova apetakaddamo, saṃsārā na bhavanti tādino.
7. Arahantavaggo.96: Santaṃ tassa manaṃ hoti, santā vācā ca kamma ca;\nSammadaññā vimuttassa, upasantassa tādino.
7. Arahantavaggo.97: Assaddho akataññū ca, sandhicchedo ca yo naro;\nHatāvakāso vantāso, sa ve uttamaporiso.
7. Arahantavaggo.98: Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;\nYattha arahanto viharanti, taṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṃ.
7. Arahantavaggo.99: Ramaṇīyāni araññāni, yattha na ramatī jano;\nVītarāgā ramissanti, na te kāmagavesino.\nArahantavaggo sattamo niṭṭhito.

8. Sahassavaggo.100: Sahassamapi ce vācā, anatthapadasaṃhitā;\nEkaṃ atthapadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammati.
8. Sahassavaggo.101: Sahassamapi ce gāthā, anatthapadasaṃhitā;\nEkaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammati.
8. Sahassavaggo.102: Yo ca gāthā sataṃ bhāse, anatthapadasaṃhitā [anatthapadasañhitaṃ (ka.) visesanaṃ hetaṃ gāthātipadassa];\nEkaṃ dhammapadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammati.
8. Sahassavaggo.103: Yo sahassaṃ sahassena, saṅgāme mānuse jine;\nEkañca jeyyamattānaṃ [attānaṃ (sī. pī.)], sa ve saṅgāmajuttamo.
8. Sahassavaggo.104: Attā have jitaṃ seyyo, yā cāyaṃ itarā pajā;\nAttadantassa posassa, niccaṃ saññatacārino.
8. Sahassavaggo.105: Neva devo na gandhabbo, na māro saha brahmunā;\nJitaṃ apajitaṃ kayirā, tathārūpassa jantuno.
8. Sahassavaggo.106: Māse māse sahassena, yo yajetha sataṃ samaṃ;\nEkañca bhāvitattānaṃ, muhuttamapi pūjaye;\nSāyeva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ hutaṃ.
8. Sahassavaggo.107: Yo ca vassasataṃ jantu, aggiṃ paricare vane;\nEkañca bhāvitattānaṃ, muhuttamapi pūjaye;\nSāyeva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ hutaṃ.
8. Sahassavaggo.108: Yaṃ kiñci yiṭṭhaṃ va hutaṃ va [yiṭṭhañca hutañca (ka.)] loke, saṃvaccharaṃ yajetha puññapekkho;\nSabbampi taṃ na catubhāgameti, abhivādanā ujjugatesu seyyo.
8. Sahassavaggo.109: Abhivādanasīlissa, niccaṃ vuḍḍhāpacāyino [vaddhāpacāyino (sī. pī.)];\nCattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyu vaṇṇo sukhaṃ balaṃ.
8. Sahassavaggo.110: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, dussīlo asamāhito;\nEkāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, sīlavantassa jhāyino.
8. Sahassavaggo.111: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, duppañño asamāhito;\nEkāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, paññavantassa jhāyino.
8. Sahassavaggo.112: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, kusīto hīnavīriyo;\nEkāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, vīriyamārabhato daḷhaṃ.
8. Sahassavaggo.113: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, apassaṃ udayabbayaṃ;\nEkāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, passato udayabbayaṃ.
8. Sahassavaggo.114: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, apassaṃ amataṃ padaṃ;\nEkāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, passato amataṃ padaṃ.
8. Sahassavaggo.115: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, apassaṃ dhammamuttamaṃ;\nEkāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, passato dhammamuttamaṃ.\nSahassavaggo aṭṭhamo niṭṭhito.

9. Pāpavaggo.116: Abhittharetha kalyāṇe, pāpā cittaṃ nivāraye;\nDandhañhi karoto puññaṃ, pāpasmiṃ ramatī mano.
9. Pāpavaggo.117: Pāpañce puriso kayirā, na naṃ [na taṃ (sī. pī.)] kayirā punappunaṃ;\nNa tamhi chandaṃ kayirātha, dukkho pāpassa uccayo.
9. Pāpavaggo.118: Puññañce puriso kayirā, kayirā naṃ [kayirāthetaṃ (sī. syā.), kayirāthenaṃ (pī.)] punappunaṃ;\nTamhi chandaṃ kayirātha, sukho puññassa uccayo.
9. Pāpavaggo.119: Pāpopi passati bhadraṃ, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati;\nYadā ca paccati pāpaṃ, atha pāpo pāpāni [atha pāpāni (?)] passati.
9. Pāpavaggo.120: Bhadropi passati pāpaṃ, yāva bhadraṃ na paccati;\nYadā ca paccati bhadraṃ, atha bhadro bhadrāni [atha bhadrāni (?)] passati.
9. Pāpavaggo.121: Māvamaññetha [māppamaññetha (sī. syā. pī.)] pāpassa, na mantaṃ [na maṃ taṃ (sī. pī.), na mattaṃ (syā.)] āgamissati;\nUdabindunipātena, udakumbhopi pūrati;\nBālo pūrati [pūrati bālo (sī. ka.), āpūrati bālo (syā.)] pāpassa, thokaṃ thokampi [thoka thokampi (sī. pī.)] ācinaṃ.
9. Pāpavaggo.122: Māvamaññetha puññassa, na mantaṃ āgamissati;\nUdabindunipātena, udakumbhopi pūrati;\nDhīro pūrati puññassa, thokaṃ thokampi ācinaṃ.
9. Pāpavaggo.123: Vāṇijova bhayaṃ maggaṃ, appasattho mahaddhano;\nVisaṃ jīvitukāmova, pāpāni parivajjaye.
9. Pāpavaggo.124: Pāṇimhi ce vaṇo nāssa, hareyya pāṇinā visaṃ;\nNābbaṇaṃ visamanveti, natthi pāpaṃ akubbato.
9. Pāpavaggo.125: Yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati, suddhassa posassa anaṅgaṇassa;\nTameva bālaṃ pacceti pāpaṃ, sukhumo rajo paṭivātaṃva khitto.
9. Pāpavaggo.126: Gabbhameke uppajjanti, nirayaṃ pāpakammino;\nSaggaṃ sugatino yanti, parinibbanti anāsavā.
9. Pāpavaggo.127: Na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe, na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa [pavisaṃ (syā.)];\nNa vijjatī [na vijjati (ka. sī. pī. ka.)] so jagatippadeso, yatthaṭṭhito [yatraṭṭhito (syā.)] mucceyya pāpakammā.
9. Pāpavaggo.128: Na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe, na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa;\nNa vijjatī so jagatippadeso, yatthaṭṭhitaṃ [yatraṭṭhitaṃ (syā.)] nappasaheyya maccu.\nPāpavaggo navamo niṭṭhito.

10. Daṇḍavaggo.129: Sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno;\nAttānaṃ upamaṃ katvā, na haneyya na ghātaye.
10. Daṇḍavaggo.130: Sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbesaṃ jīvitaṃ piyaṃ;\nAttānaṃ upamaṃ katvā, na haneyya na ghātaye.
10. Daṇḍavaggo.131: Sukhakāmāni bhūtāni, yo daṇḍena vihiṃsati;\nAttano sukhamesāno, pecca so na labhate sukhaṃ.
10. Daṇḍavaggo.132: Sukhakāmāni bhūtāni, yo daṇḍena na hiṃsati;\nAttano sukhamesāno, pecca so labhate sukhaṃ.
10. Daṇḍavaggo.133: Māvoca pharusaṃ kañci, vuttā paṭivadeyyu taṃ [paṭivadeyyuṃ taṃ (ka.)];\nDukkhā hi sārambhakathā, paṭidaṇḍā phuseyyu taṃ [phuseyyuṃ taṃ (ka.)].
10. Daṇḍavaggo.134: Sace neresi attānaṃ, kaṃso upahato yathā;\nEsa pattosi nibbānaṃ, sārambho te na vijjati.
10. Daṇḍavaggo.135: Yathā daṇḍena gopālo, gāvo pājeti gocaraṃ;\nEvaṃ jarā ca maccu ca, āyuṃ pājenti pāṇinaṃ.
10. Daṇḍavaggo.136: Atha pāpāni kammāni, karaṃ bālo na bujjhati;\nSehi kammehi dummedho, aggidaḍḍhova tappati.
10. Daṇḍavaggo.137: Yo daṇḍena adaṇḍesu, appaduṭṭhesu dussati;\nDasannamaññataraṃ ṭhānaṃ, khippameva nigacchati.
10. Daṇḍavaggo.138: Vedanaṃ pharusaṃ jāniṃ, sarīrassa ca bhedanaṃ [sarīrassa pabhedanaṃ (syā.)];\nGarukaṃ vāpi ābādhaṃ, cittakkhepañca [cittakkhepaṃ va (sī. syā. pī.)] pāpuṇe.
10. Daṇḍavaggo.139: Rājato vā upasaggaṃ [upassaggaṃ (sī. pī.)], abbhakkhānañca [abbhakkhānaṃ va (sī. pī.)] dāruṇaṃ;\nParikkhayañca [parikkhayaṃ va (sī. syā. pī.)] ñātīnaṃ, bhogānañca [bhogānaṃ va (sī. syā. pī.)] pabhaṅguraṃ [pabhaṅgunaṃ (ka.)].
10. Daṇḍavaggo.140: Atha vāssa agārāni, aggi ḍahati [ḍayhati (ka.)] pāvako;\nKāyassa bhedā duppañño, nirayaṃ sopapajjati [so upapajjati (sī. syā.)].
10. Daṇḍavaggo.141: Na naggacariyā na jaṭā na paṅkā, nānāsakā thaṇḍilasāyikā vā;\nRajojallaṃ ukkuṭikappadhānaṃ, sodhenti maccaṃ avitiṇṇakaṅkhaṃ.
10. Daṇḍavaggo.142: Alaṅkato cepi samaṃ careyya, santo danto niyato brahmacārī;\nSabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, so brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhu.
10. Daṇḍavaggo.143: Hirīnisedho puriso, koci lokasmi vijjati;\nYo niddaṃ [nindaṃ (sī. pī.) saṃ. ni. 1.18] apabodheti [apabodhati (sī. syā. pī.)], asso bhadro kasāmiva.
10. Daṇḍavaggo.144: Asso yathā bhadro kasāniviṭṭho, ātāpino saṃvegino bhavātha;\nSaddhāya sīlena ca vīriyena ca, samādhinā dhammavinicchayena ca;\nSampannavijjācaraṇā patissatā, jahissatha [pahassatha (sī. syā. pī.)] dukkhamidaṃ anappakaṃ.
10. Daṇḍavaggo.145: Udakañhi nayanti nettikā, usukārā namayanti tejanaṃ;\nDāruṃ namayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti subbatā.\nDaṇḍavaggo dasamo niṭṭhito.

11. Jarāvaggo.146: Ko nu hāso [kinnu hāso (ka.)] kimānando, niccaṃ pajjalite sati;\nAndhakārena onaddhā, padīpaṃ na gavesatha.
11. Jarāvaggo.147: Passa cittakataṃ bimbaṃ, arukāyaṃ samussitaṃ;\nĀturaṃ bahusaṅkappaṃ, yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhiti.
11. Jarāvaggo.148: Parijiṇṇamidaṃ rūpaṃ, roganīḷaṃ [roganiḍḍhaṃ (sī. pī.), roganiddhaṃ (syā.)] pabhaṅguraṃ;\nBhijjati pūtisandeho, maraṇantañhi jīvitaṃ.
11. Jarāvaggo.149: Yānimāni apatthāni [yānimāni apatthāni (sī. syā. pī.), yānimāni’paviddhāni (?)], alābūneva [alāpūneva (sī. syā. pī.)] sārade;\nKāpotakāni aṭṭhīni, tāni disvāna kā rati.
11. Jarāvaggo.150: Aṭṭhīnaṃ nagaraṃ kataṃ, maṃsalohitalepanaṃ;\nYattha jarā ca maccu ca, māno makkho ca ohito.
11. Jarāvaggo.151: Jīranti ve rājarathā sucittā, atho sarīrampi jaraṃ upeti;\nSatañca dhammo na jaraṃ upeti, santo have sabbhi pavedayanti.
11. Jarāvaggo.152: Appassutāyaṃ puriso, balibaddhova [balivaddova (sī. syā. pī.)] jīrati;\nMaṃsāni tassa vaḍḍhanti, paññā tassa na vaḍḍhati.
11. Jarāvaggo.153: Anekajātisaṃsāraṃ, sandhāvissaṃ anibbisaṃ;\nGahakāraṃ [gahakārakaṃ (sī. syā. pī.)] gavesanto, dukkhā jāti punappunaṃ.
11. Jarāvaggo.154: Gahakāraka diṭṭhosi, puna gehaṃ na kāhasi;\nSabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;\nVisaṅkhāragataṃ cittaṃ, taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā.
11. Jarāvaggo.155: Acaritvā brahmacariyaṃ, aladdhā yobbane dhanaṃ;\nJiṇṇakoñcāva jhāyanti, khīṇamaccheva pallale.
11. Jarāvaggo.156: Acaritvā brahmacariyaṃ, aladdhā yobbane dhanaṃ;\nSenti cāpātikhīṇāva, purāṇāni anutthunaṃ.\nJarāvaggo ekādasamo niṭṭhito.

12. Attavaggo.157: Attānañce piyaṃ jaññā, rakkheyya naṃ surakkhitaṃ;\nTiṇṇaṃ aññataraṃ yāmaṃ, paṭijaggeyya paṇḍito.
12. Attavaggo.158: Attānameva paṭhamaṃ, patirūpe nivesaye;\nAthaññamanusāseyya, na kilisseyya paṇḍito.
12. Attavaggo.159: Attānaṃ ce tathā kayirā, yathāññamanusāsati;\nSudanto vata dametha, attā hi kira duddamo.
12. Attavaggo.160: Attā hi attano nātho, ko hi nātho paro siyā;\nAttanā hi sudantena, nāthaṃ labhati dullabhaṃ.
12. Attavaggo.161: Attanā hi kataṃ pāpaṃ, attajaṃ attasambhavaṃ;\nAbhimatthati [abhimantati (sī. pī.)] dummedhaṃ, vajiraṃ vasmamayaṃ [vajiraṃva’mhamayaṃ (syā. ka.)] maṇiṃ.
12. Attavaggo.162: Yassa accantadussīlyaṃ, māluvā sālamivotthataṃ;\nKaroti so tathattānaṃ, yathā naṃ icchatī diso.
12. Attavaggo.163: Sukarāni asādhūni, attano ahitāni ca;\nYaṃ ve hitañca sādhuñca, taṃ ve paramadukkaraṃ.
12. Attavaggo.164: Yo sāsanaṃ arahataṃ, ariyānaṃ dhammajīvinaṃ;\nPaṭikkosati dummedho, diṭṭhiṃ nissāya pāpikaṃ;\nPhalāni kaṭṭhakasseva, attaghātāya [attaghaññāya (sī. syā. pī.)] phallati.
12. Attavaggo.165: Attanā hi [attanāva (sī. syā. pī.)] kataṃ pāpaṃ, attanā saṃkilissati;\nAttanā akataṃ pāpaṃ, attanāva visujjhati;\nSuddhī asuddhi paccattaṃ, nāñño aññaṃ [nāññamañño(sī.)] visodhaye.
12. Attavaggo.166: Attadatthaṃ paratthena, bahunāpi na hāpaye;\nAttadatthamabhiññāya, sadatthapasuto siyā.\nAttavaggo dvādasamo niṭṭhito.

13. Lokavaggo.167: Hīnaṃ dhammaṃ na seveyya, pamādena na saṃvase;\nMicchādiṭṭhiṃ na seveyya, na siyā lokavaḍḍhano.
13. Lokavaggo.168: Uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyya, dhammaṃ sucaritaṃ care;\nDhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca.
13. Lokavaggo.169: Dhammaṃ care sucaritaṃ, na naṃ duccaritaṃ care;\nDhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca.
13. Lokavaggo.170: Yathā pubbuḷakaṃ [pubbuḷakaṃ (sī. pī.)] passe, yathā passe marīcikaṃ;\nEvaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passati.
13. Lokavaggo.171: Etha passathimaṃ lokaṃ, cittaṃ rājarathūpamaṃ;\nYattha bālā visīdanti, natthi saṅgo vijānataṃ.
13. Lokavaggo.172: Yo ca pubbe pamajjitvā, pacchā so nappamajjati;\nSomaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā.
13. Lokavaggo.173: Yassa pāpaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ, kusalena pidhīyati [pitīyati (sī. syā. pī.)];\nSomaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā.
13. Lokavaggo.174: Andhabhūto [andhībhūto (ka.)] ayaṃ loko, tanukettha vipassati;\nSakuṇo jālamuttova, appo saggāya gacchati.
13. Lokavaggo.175: Haṃsādiccapathe yanti, ākāse yanti iddhiyā;\nNīyanti dhīrā lokamhā, jetvā māraṃ savāhiniṃ [savāhanaṃ (syā. ka.)].
13. Lokavaggo.176: Ekaṃ dhammaṃ atītassa, musāvādissa jantuno;\nVitiṇṇaparalokassa, natthi pāpaṃ akāriyaṃ.
13. Lokavaggo.177: Na ve kadariyā devalokaṃ vajanti, bālā have nappasaṃsanti dānaṃ;\nDhīro ca dānaṃ anumodamāno, teneva so hoti sukhī parattha.
13. Lokavaggo.178: Pathabyā ekarajjena, saggassa gamanena vā;\nSabbalokādhipaccena, sotāpattiphalaṃ varaṃ.\nLokavaggo terasamo niṭṭhito.

14. Buddhavaggo.179: Yassa jitaṃ nāvajīyati, jitaṃ yassa [jitamassa (sī. syā. pī.), jitaṃ massa (ka.)] no yāti koci loke;\nTaṃ buddhamanantagocaraṃ, apadaṃ kena padena nessatha.
14. Buddhavaggo.180: Yassa jālinī visattikā, taṇhā natthi kuhiñci netave;\nTaṃ buddhamanantagocaraṃ, apadaṃ kena padena nessatha.
14. Buddhavaggo.181: Ye jhānapasutā dhīrā, nekkhammūpasame ratā;\nDevāpi tesaṃ pihayanti, sambuddhānaṃ satīmataṃ.
14. Buddhavaggo.182: Kiccho manussapaṭilābho, kicchaṃ maccāna jīvitaṃ;\nKicchaṃ saddhammassavanaṃ, kiccho buddhānamuppādo.
14. Buddhavaggo.183: Sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ, kusalassa upasampadā [kusalassūpasampadā (syā.)];\nSacittapariyodapanaṃ [sacittapariyodāpanaṃ (?)], etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ.
14. Buddhavaggo.184: Khantī paramaṃ tapo titikkhā, nibbānaṃ [nibbāṇaṃ (ka. sī. pī.)] paramaṃ vadanti buddhā;\nNa hi pabbajito parūpaghātī, na [ayaṃ nakāro sī. syā. pī. pātthakesu na dissati] samaṇo hoti paraṃ viheṭhayanto.
14. Buddhavaggo.185: Anūpavādo anūpaghāto [anupavādo anupaghāto (syā. ka.)], pātimokkhe ca saṃvaro;\nMattaññutā ca bhattasmiṃ, pantañca sayanāsanaṃ;\nAdhicitte ca āyogo, etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ.
14. Buddhavaggo.186: Na kahāpaṇavassena, titti kāmesu vijjati;\nAppassādā dukhā kāmā, iti viññāya paṇḍito.
14. Buddhavaggo.187: Api dibbesu kāmesu, ratiṃ so nādhigacchati;\nTaṇhakkhayarato hoti, sammāsambuddhasāvako.
14. Buddhavaggo.188: Bahuṃ ve saraṇaṃ yanti, pabbatāni vanāni ca;\nĀrāmarukkhacetyāni, manussā bhayatajjitā.
14. Buddhavaggo.189: Netaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, netaṃ saraṇamuttamaṃ;\nNetaṃ saraṇamāgamma, sabbadukkhā pamuccati.
14. Buddhavaggo.190: Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;\nCattāri ariyasaccāni, sammappaññāya passati.
14. Buddhavaggo.191: Dukkhaṃ dukkhasamuppādaṃ, dukkhassa ca atikkamaṃ;\nAriyaṃ caṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ, dukkhūpasamagāminaṃ.
14. Buddhavaggo.192: Etaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, etaṃ saraṇamuttamaṃ;\nEtaṃ saraṇamāgamma, sabbadukkhā pamuccati.
14. Buddhavaggo.193: Dullabho purisājañño, na so sabbattha jāyati;\nYattha so jāyati dhīro, taṃ kulaṃ sukhamedhati.
14. Buddhavaggo.194: Sukho buddhānamuppādo, sukhā saddhammadesanā;\nSukhā saṅghassa sāmaggī, samaggānaṃ tapo sukho.
14. Buddhavaggo.195: Pūjārahe pūjayato, buddhe yadi va sāvake;\nPapañcasamatikkante, tiṇṇasokapariddave.
14. Buddhavaggo.196: Te tādise pūjayato, nibbute akutobhaye;\nNa sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātuṃ, imettamapi kenaci.\nBuddhavaggo cuddasamo niṭṭhito.

15. Sukhavaggo.197: Susukhaṃ vata jīvāma, verinesu averino;\nVerinesu manussesu, viharāma averino.
15. Sukhavaggo.198: Susukhaṃ vata jīvāma, āturesu anāturā;\nĀturesu manussesu, viharāma anāturā.
15. Sukhavaggo.199: Susukhaṃ vata jīvāma, ussukesu anussukā;\nUssukesu manassesu, viharāma anussukā.
15. Sukhavaggo.200: Susukhaṃ vata jīvāma, yesaṃ no natthi kiñcanaṃ;\nPītibhakkhā bhavissāma, devā ābhassarā yathā.
15. Sukhavaggo.201: Jayaṃ veraṃ pasavati, dukkhaṃ seti parājito;\nUpasanto sukhaṃ seti, hitvā jayaparājayaṃ.
15. Sukhavaggo.202: Natthi rāgasamo aggi, natthi dosasamo kali;\nNatthi khandhasamā [khandhādisā (sī. syā. pī. rūpasiddhiyā sameti)] dukkhā, natthi santiparaṃ sukhaṃ.
15. Sukhavaggo.203: Jighacchāparamā rogā, saṅkhāraparamā [saṅkārā paramā (bahūsu)] dukhā;\nEtaṃ ñatvā yathābhūtaṃ, nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ.
15. Sukhavaggo.204: Ārogyaparamā lābhā, santuṭṭhiparamaṃ dhanaṃ;\nVissāsaparamā ñāti [vissāsaparamo ñāti (ka. sī.), vissāsaparamā ñātī (sī. aṭṭha.), vissāsā paramā ñāti (ka.)], nibbānaṃ paramaṃ [nibbāṇaparamaṃ (ka. sī.)] sukhaṃ.
15. Sukhavaggo.205: Pavivekarasaṃ pitvā [pītvā (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)], rasaṃ upasamassa ca;\nNiddaro hoti nippāpo, dhammapītirasaṃ pivaṃ.
15. Sukhavaggo.206: Sāhu dassanamariyānaṃ, sannivāso sadā sukho;\nAdassanena bālānaṃ, niccameva sukhī siyā.
15. Sukhavaggo.207: Bālasaṅgatacārī [bālasaṅgaticārī (ka.)] hi, dīghamaddhāna socati;\nDukkho bālehi saṃvāso, amitteneva sabbadā;\nDhīro ca sukhasaṃvāso, ñātīnaṃva samāgamo.
15. Sukhavaggo.208:
Tasmā hi –
Dhīrañca paññañca bahussutañca, dhorayhasīlaṃ vatavantamariyaṃ;
Taṃ tādisaṃ sappurisaṃ sumedhaṃ, bhajetha nakkhattapathaṃva candimā [tasmā hi dhīraṃ paññañca, bahussutañca dhorayhaṃ; sīlaṃ dhutavatamariyaṃ, taṃ tādisaṃ sappurisaṃ; sumedhaṃ bhajetha nakkhattapathaṃva candimā; (ka.)].
Sukhavaggo pannarasamo niṭṭhito.

16. Piyavaggo.209: Ayoge yuñjamattānaṃ, yogasmiñca ayojayaṃ;\nAtthaṃ hitvā piyaggāhī, pihetattānuyoginaṃ.
16. Piyavaggo.210: Mā piyehi samāgañchi, appiyehi kudācanaṃ;\nPiyānaṃ adassanaṃ dukkhaṃ, appiyānañca dassanaṃ.
16. Piyavaggo.211: Tasmā piyaṃ na kayirātha, piyāpāyo hi pāpako;\nGanthā tesaṃ na vijjanti, yesaṃ natthi piyāppiyaṃ.
16. Piyavaggo.212: Piyato jāyatī soko, piyato jāyatī [jāyate (ka.)] bhayaṃ;\nPiyato vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhayaṃ.
16. Piyavaggo.213: Pemato jāyatī soko, pemato jāyatī bhayaṃ;\nPemato vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhayaṃ.
16. Piyavaggo.214: Ratiyā jāyatī soko, ratiyā jāyatī bhayaṃ;\nRatiyā vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhayaṃ.
16. Piyavaggo.215: Kāmato jāyatī soko, kāmato jāyatī bhayaṃ;\nKāmato vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhayaṃ.
16. Piyavaggo.216: Taṇhāya jāyatī [jāyate (ka.)] soko, taṇhāya jāyatī bhayaṃ;\nTaṇhāya vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhayaṃ.
16. Piyavaggo.217: Sīladassanasampannaṃ, dhammaṭṭhaṃ saccavedinaṃ;\nAttano kamma kubbānaṃ, taṃ jano kurute piyaṃ.
16. Piyavaggo.218: Chandajāto anakkhāte, manasā ca phuṭo siyā;\nKāmesu ca appaṭibaddhacitto [appaṭibandhacitto (ka.)], uddhaṃsototi vuccati.
16. Piyavaggo.219: Cirappavāsiṃ purisaṃ, dūrato sotthimāgataṃ;\nÑātimittā suhajjā ca, abhinandanti āgataṃ.
16. Piyavaggo.220: Tatheva katapuññampi, asmā lokā paraṃ gataṃ;\nPuññāni paṭigaṇhanti, piyaṃ ñātīva āgataṃ.\nPiyavaggo soḷasamo niṭṭhito.

17. Kodhavaggo.221: Kodhaṃ jahe vippajaheyya mānaṃ, saṃyojanaṃ sabbamatikkameyya;\nTaṃ nāmarūpasmimasajjamānaṃ, akiñcanaṃ nānupatanti dukkhā.
17. Kodhavaggo.222: Yo ve uppatitaṃ kodhaṃ, rathaṃ bhantaṃva vāraye [dhāraye (sī. syā. pī.)];\nTamahaṃ sārathiṃ brūmi, rasmiggāho itaro jano.
17. Kodhavaggo.223: Akkodhena jine kodhaṃ, asādhuṃ sādhunā jine;\nJine kadariyaṃ dānena, saccenālikavādinaṃ.
17. Kodhavaggo.224: Saccaṃ bhaṇe na kujjheyya, dajjā appampi [dajjā’ppasmimpi (sī. pī.), dajjā appasmi (syā. ka.)] yācito;\nEtehi tīhi ṭhānehi, gacche devāna santike.
17. Kodhavaggo.225: Ahiṃsakā ye munayo [ahiṃsakāyā munayo (ka.)], niccaṃ kāyena saṃvutā;\nTe yanti accutaṃ ṭhānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socare.
17. Kodhavaggo.226: Sadā jāgaramānānaṃ, ahorattānusikkhinaṃ;\nNibbānaṃ adhimuttānaṃ, atthaṃ gacchanti āsavā.
17. Kodhavaggo.227: Porāṇametaṃ atula, netaṃ ajjatanāmiva;\nNindanti tuṇhimāsīnaṃ, nindanti bahubhāṇinaṃ;\nMitabhāṇimpi nindanti, natthi loke anindito.
17. Kodhavaggo.228: Na cāhu na ca bhavissati, na cetarahi vijjati;\nEkantaṃ nindito poso, ekantaṃ vā pasaṃsito.
17. Kodhavaggo.229: Yaṃ ce viññū pasaṃsanti, anuvicca suve suve;\nAcchiddavuttiṃ [acchinnavuttiṃ (ka.)] medhāviṃ, paññāsīlasamāhitaṃ.
17. Kodhavaggo.230: Nikkhaṃ [nekkhaṃ (sī. syā. pī.)] jambonadasseva, ko taṃ ninditumarahati;\nDevāpi naṃ pasaṃsanti, brahmunāpi pasaṃsito.
17. Kodhavaggo.231: Kāyappakopaṃ rakkheyya, kāyena saṃvuto siyā;\nKāyaduccaritaṃ hitvā, kāyena sucaritaṃ care.
17. Kodhavaggo.232: Vacīpakopaṃ rakkheyya, vācāya saṃvuto siyā;\nVacīduccaritaṃ hitvā, vācāya sucaritaṃ care.
17. Kodhavaggo.233: Manopakopaṃ rakkheyya, manasā saṃvuto siyā;\nManoduccaritaṃ hitvā, manasā sucaritaṃ care.
17. Kodhavaggo.234: Kāyena saṃvutā dhīrā, atho vācāya saṃvutā;\nManasā saṃvutā dhīrā, te ve suparisaṃvutā.\nKodhavaggo sattarasamo niṭṭhito.

18. Malavaggo.235: Paṇḍupalāsova dānisi, yamapurisāpi ca te [taṃ (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)] upaṭṭhitā;\nUyyogamukhe ca tiṭṭhasi, pātheyyampi ca te na vijjati.
18. Malavaggo.236: So karohi dīpamattano, khippaṃ vāyama paṇḍito bhava;\nNiddhantamalo anaṅgaṇo, dibbaṃ ariyabhūmiṃ upehisi [dibbaṃ ariyabhūmimehisi (sī. syā. pī.), dibbamariyabhūmiṃ upehisi (?)].
18. Malavaggo.237: Upanītavayo ca dānisi, sampayātosi yamassa santike;\nVāso [vāsopi ca (bahūsu)] te natthi antarā, pātheyyampi ca te na vijjati.
18. Malavaggo.238: So karohi dīpamattano, khippaṃ vāyama paṇḍito bhava;\nNiddhantamalo anaṅgaṇo, na punaṃ jātijaraṃ [na puna jātijaraṃ (sī. syā.), na puna jātijjaraṃ (ka.)] upehisi.
18. Malavaggo.239: Anupubbena medhāvī, thokaṃ thokaṃ khaṇe khaṇe;\nKammāro rajatasseva, niddhame malamattano.
18. Malavaggo.240: Ayasāva malaṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ [samuṭṭhāya (ka.)], tatuṭṭhāya [taduṭṭhāya (sī. syā. pī.)] tameva khādati;\nEvaṃ atidhonacārinaṃ, sāni kammāni [sakakammāni (sī. pī.)] nayanti duggatiṃ.
18. Malavaggo.241: Asajjhāyamalā mantā, anuṭṭhānamalā gharā;\nMalaṃ vaṇṇassa kosajjaṃ, pamādo rakkhato malaṃ.
18. Malavaggo.242: Malitthiyā duccaritaṃ, maccheraṃ dadato malaṃ;\nMalā ve pāpakā dhammā, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca.
18. Malavaggo.243: Tato malā malataraṃ, avijjā paramaṃ malaṃ;\nEtaṃ malaṃ pahantvāna, nimmalā hotha bhikkhavo.
18. Malavaggo.244: Sujīvaṃ ahirikena, kākasūrena dhaṃsinā;\nPakkhandinā pagabbhena, saṃkiliṭṭhena jīvitaṃ.
18. Malavaggo.245: Hirīmatā ca dujjīvaṃ, niccaṃ sucigavesinā;\nAlīnenāppagabbhena, suddhājīvena passatā.
18. Malavaggo.246: Yo pāṇamatipāteti, musāvādañca bhāsati;\nLoke adinnamādiyati, paradārañca gacchati.
18. Malavaggo.247: Surāmerayapānañca, yo naro anuyuñjati;\nIdhevameso lokasmiṃ, mūlaṃ khaṇati attano.
18. Malavaggo.248: Evaṃ bho purisa jānāhi, pāpadhammā asaññatā;\nMā taṃ lobho adhammo ca, ciraṃ dukkhāya randhayuṃ.
18. Malavaggo.249: Dadāti ve yathāsaddhaṃ, yathāpasādanaṃ [yattha pasādanaṃ (katthaci)] jano;\nTattha yo maṅku bhavati [tattha ce maṃku yo hoti (sī.), tattha yo maṅkuto hoti (syā.)], paresaṃ pānabhojane;\nNa so divā vā rattiṃ vā, samādhimadhigacchati.
18. Malavaggo.250: Yassa cetaṃ samucchinnaṃ, mūlaghaccaṃ [mūlaghacchaṃ (ka.)] samūhataṃ;\nSa ve divā vā rattiṃ vā, samādhimadhigacchati.
18. Malavaggo.251: Natthi rāgasamo aggi, natthi dosasamo gaho;\nNatthi mohasamaṃ jālaṃ, natthi taṇhāsamā nadī.
18. Malavaggo.252: Sudassaṃ vajjamaññesaṃ, attano pana duddasaṃ;\nParesaṃ hi so vajjāni, opunāti [ophunāti (ka.)] yathā bhusaṃ;\nAttano pana chādeti, kaliṃva kitavā saṭho.
18. Malavaggo.253: Paravajjānupassissa, niccaṃ ujjhānasaññino;\nĀsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā.
18. Malavaggo.254: Ākāseva padaṃ natthi, samaṇo natthi bāhire;\nPapañcābhiratā pajā, nippapañcā tathāgatā.
18. Malavaggo.255: Ākāseva padaṃ natthi, samaṇo natthi bāhire;\nSaṅkhārā sassatā natthi, natthi buddhānamiñjitaṃ.\nMalavaggo aṭṭhārasamo niṭṭhito.

19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.256: Na tena hoti dhammaṭṭho, yenatthaṃ sāhasā [sahasā (sī. syā. ka.)] naye;\nYo ca atthaṃ anatthañca, ubho niccheyya paṇḍito.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.257: Asāhasena dhammena, samena nayatī pare;\nDhammassa gutto medhāvī, ‘‘dhammaṭṭho’’ti pavuccati.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.258: Na tena paṇḍito hoti, yāvatā bahu bhāsati;\nKhemī averī abhayo, ‘‘paṇḍito’’ti pavuccati.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.259: Na tāvatā dhammadharo, yāvatā bahu bhāsati;\nYo ca appampi sutvāna, dhammaṃ kāyena passati;\nSa ve dhammadharo hoti, yo dhammaṃ nappamajjati.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.260: Na tena thero so hoti [thero hoti (sī. syā.)], yenassa palitaṃ siro;\nParipakko vayo tassa, ‘‘moghajiṇṇo’’ti vuccati.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.261: Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo;\nSa ve vantamalo dhīro, ‘‘thero’’ iti [so theroti (syā. ka.)] pavuccati.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.262: Na vākkaraṇamattena, vaṇṇapokkharatāya vā;\nSādhurūpo naro hoti, issukī maccharī saṭho.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.263: Yassa cetaṃ samucchinnaṃ, mūlaghaccaṃ samūhataṃ;\nSa vantadoso medhāvī, ‘‘sādhurūpo’’ti vuccati.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.264: Na muṇḍakena samaṇo, abbato alikaṃ bhaṇaṃ;\nIcchālobhasamāpanno, samaṇo kiṃ bhavissati.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.265: Yo ca sameti pāpāni, aṇuṃ thūlāni sabbaso;\nSamitattā hi pāpānaṃ, ‘‘samaṇo’’ti pavuccati.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.266: Na tena bhikkhu so hoti, yāvatā bhikkhate pare;\nVissaṃ dhammaṃ samādāya, bhikkhu hoti na tāvatā.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.267: Yodha puññañca pāpañca, bāhetvā brahmacariyavā [brahmacariyaṃ (ka.)];\nSaṅkhāya loke carati, sa ve ‘‘bhikkhū’’ti vuccati.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.268: Na monena munī hoti, mūḷharūpo aviddasu;\nYo ca tulaṃva paggayha, varamādāya paṇḍito.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.269: Pāpāni parivajjeti, sa munī tena so muni;\nYo munāti ubho loke, ‘‘muni’’ tena pavuccati.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.270: Na tena ariyo hoti, yena pāṇāni hiṃsati;\nAhiṃsā sabbapāṇānaṃ, ‘‘ariyo’’ti pavuccati.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.271: Na sīlabbatamattena, bāhusaccena vā pana;\nAtha vā samādhilābhena, vivittasayanena vā.
19. Dhammaṭṭhavaggo.272: Phusāmi nekkhammasukhaṃ, aputhujjanasevitaṃ;\nBhikkhu vissāsamāpādi, appatto āsavakkhayaṃ.\nDhammaṭṭhavaggo ekūnavīsatimo niṭṭhito.

20. Maggavaggo.273: Maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko seṭṭho, saccānaṃ caturo padā;\nVirāgo seṭṭho dhammānaṃ, dvipadānañca cakkhumā.
20. Maggavaggo.274: Eseva [esova (sī. pī.)] maggo natthañño, dassanassa visuddhiyā;\nEtañhi tumhe paṭipajjatha, mārassetaṃ pamohanaṃ.
20. Maggavaggo.275: Etañhi tumhe paṭipannā, dukkhassantaṃ karissatha;\nAkkhāto vo [akkhāto ve (sī. pī.)] mayā maggo, aññāya sallakantanaṃ [sallasanthanaṃ (sī. pī.), sallasatthanaṃ (syā.)].
20. Maggavaggo.276: Tumhehi kiccamātappaṃ, akkhātāro tathāgatā;\nPaṭipannā pamokkhanti, jhāyino mārabandhanā.
20. Maggavaggo.277: ‘‘Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā’’ti, yadā paññāya passati;\nAtha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā.
20. Maggavaggo.278: ‘‘Sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā’’ti, yadā paññāya passati;\nAtha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā.
20. Maggavaggo.279: ‘‘Sabbe dhammā anattā’’ti, yadā paññāya passati;\nAtha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā.
20. Maggavaggo.280: Uṭṭhānakālamhi anuṭṭhahāno, yuvā balī ālasiyaṃ upeto;\nSaṃsannasaṅkappamano [asampannasaṅkappamano (ka.)] kusīto, paññāya maggaṃ alaso na vindati.
20. Maggavaggo.281: Vācānurakkhī manasā susaṃvuto, kāyena ca nākusalaṃ kayirā [akusalaṃ na kayirā (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)];\nEte tayo kammapathe visodhaye, ārādhaye maggamisippaveditaṃ.
20. Maggavaggo.282: Yogā ve jāyatī [jāyate (katthaci)] bhūri, ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo;\nEtaṃ dvedhāpathaṃ ñatvā, bhavāya vibhavāya ca;\nTathāttānaṃ niveseyya, yathā bhūri pavaḍḍhati.
20. Maggavaggo.283: Vanaṃ chindatha mā rukkhaṃ, vanato jāyate bhayaṃ;\nChetvā vanañca vanathañca, nibbanā hotha bhikkhavo.
20. Maggavaggo.284: Yāva hi vanatho na chijjati, aṇumattopi narassa nārisu;\nPaṭibaddhamanova [paṭibandhamanova (ka.)] tāva so, vaccho khīrapakova [khīrapānova (pī.)] mātari.
20. Maggavaggo.285: Ucchinda sinehamattano kumudaṃ sāradikaṃva [pāṇinā];\nSantimaggameva brūhaya, nibbānaṃ sugatena desitaṃ.
20. Maggavaggo.286: Idha vassaṃ vasissāmi, idha hemantagimhisu;\nIti bālo vicinteti, antarāyaṃ na bujjhati.
20. Maggavaggo.287: Taṃ puttapasusammattaṃ, byāsattamanasaṃ naraṃ;\nSuttaṃ gāmaṃ mahoghova, maccu ādāya gacchati.
20. Maggavaggo.288: Na santi puttā tāṇāya, na pitā nāpi bandhavā;\nAntakenādhipannassa, natthi ñātīsu tāṇatā.
20. Maggavaggo.289: Etamatthavasaṃ ñatvā, paṇḍito sīlasaṃvuto;\nNibbānagamanaṃ maggaṃ, khippameva visodhaye.\nMaggavaggo vīsatimo niṭṭhito.

21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.290: Mattāsukhapariccāgā, passe ce vipulaṃ sukhaṃ;\nCaje mattāsukhaṃ dhīro, sampassaṃ vipulaṃ sukhaṃ.
21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.291: Paradukkhūpadhānena, attano [yo attano (syā. pī. ka.)] sukhamicchati;\nVerasaṃsaggasaṃsaṭṭho, verā so na parimuccati.
21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.292: Yañhi kiccaṃ apaviddhaṃ [tadapaviddhaṃ (sī. syā.)], akiccaṃ pana kayirati;\nUnnaḷānaṃ pamattānaṃ, tesaṃ vaḍḍhanti āsavā.
21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.293: Yesañca susamāraddhā, niccaṃ kāyagatā sati;\nAkiccaṃ te na sevanti, kicce sātaccakārino;\nSatānaṃ sampajānānaṃ, atthaṃ gacchanti āsavā.
21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.294: Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā, rājāno dve ca khattiye;\nRaṭṭhaṃ sānucaraṃ hantvā, anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo.
21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.295: Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā, rājāno dve ca sotthiye;\nVeyagghapañcamaṃ hantvā, anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo.
21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.296: Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti, sadā gotamasāvakā;\nYesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṃ buddhagatā sati.
21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.297: Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti, sadā gotamasāvakā;\nYesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṃ dhammagatā sati.
21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.298: Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti, sadā gotamasāvakā;\nYesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṃ saṅghagatā sati.
21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.299: Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti, sadā gotamasāvakā;\nYesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṃ kāyagatā sati.
21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.300: Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti, sadā gotamasāvakā;\nYesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, ahiṃsāya rato mano.
21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.301: Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti, sadā gotamasāvakā;\nYesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, bhāvanāya rato mano.
21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.302: Duppabbajjaṃ durabhiramaṃ, durāvāsā gharā dukhā;\nDukkhosamānasaṃvāso, dukkhānupatitaddhagū;\nTasmā na caddhagū siyā, na ca [tasmā na caddhagū na ca (ka.)] dukkhānupatito siyā [dukkhānupātito (?)].
21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.303: Saddho sīlena sampanno, yasobhogasamappito;\nYaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattheva pūjito.
21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.304: Dūre santo pakāsenti, himavantova pabbato;\nAsantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā.
21. Pakiṇṇakavaggo.305: Ekāsanaṃ ekaseyyaṃ, eko caramatandito;\nEko damayamattānaṃ, vanante ramito siyā.\nPakiṇṇakavaggo ekavīsatimo niṭṭhito.

22. Nirayavaggo.306: Abhūtavādī nirayaṃ upeti, yo vāpi [yo cāpi (sī. pī. ka.)] katvā na karomi cāha [na karomīti cāha (syā.)];\nUbhopi te pecca samā bhavanti, nihīnakammā manujā parattha.
22. Nirayavaggo.307: Kāsāvakaṇṭhā bahavo, pāpadhammā asaññatā;\nPāpā pāpehi kammehi, nirayaṃ te upapajjare.
22. Nirayavaggo.308: Seyyo ayoguḷo bhutto, tatto aggisikhūpamo;\nYañce bhuñjeyya dussīlo, raṭṭhapiṇḍamasaññato.
22. Nirayavaggo.309: Cattāri ṭhānāni naro pamatto, āpajjati paradārūpasevī;\nApuññalābhaṃ na nikāmaseyyaṃ, nindaṃ tatīyaṃ nirayaṃ catutthaṃ.
22. Nirayavaggo.310: Apuññalābho ca gatī ca pāpikā, bhītassa bhītāya ratī ca thokikā;\nRājā ca daṇḍaṃ garukaṃ paṇeti, tasmā naro paradāraṃ na seve.
22. Nirayavaggo.311: Kuso yathā duggahito, hatthamevānukantati;\nSāmaññaṃ dupparāmaṭṭhaṃ, nirayāyupakaḍḍhati.
22. Nirayavaggo.312: Yaṃ kiñci sithilaṃ kammaṃ, saṃkiliṭṭhañca yaṃ vataṃ;\nSaṅkassaraṃ brahmacariyaṃ, na taṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
22. Nirayavaggo.313: Kayirā ce kayirāthenaṃ [kayirā naṃ (ka.)], daḷhamenaṃ parakkame;\nSithilo hi paribbājo, bhiyyo ākirate rajaṃ.
22. Nirayavaggo.314: Akataṃ dukkaṭaṃ seyyo, pacchā tappati dukkaṭaṃ;\nKatañca sukataṃ seyyo, yaṃ katvā nānutappati.
22. Nirayavaggo.315: Nagaraṃ yathā paccantaṃ, guttaṃ santarabāhiraṃ;\nEvaṃ gopetha attānaṃ, khaṇo vo [khaṇo ve (sī. pī. ka.)] mā upaccagā;\nKhaṇātītā hi socanti, nirayamhi samappitā.
22. Nirayavaggo.316: Alajjitāye lajjanti, lajjitāye na lajjare;\nMicchādiṭṭhisamādānā, sattā gacchanti duggatiṃ.
22. Nirayavaggo.317: Abhaye bhayadassino, bhaye cābhayadassino;\nMicchādiṭṭhisamādānā, sattā gacchanti duggatiṃ.
22. Nirayavaggo.318: Avajje vajjamatino, vajje cāvajjadassino;\nMicchādiṭṭhisamādānā, sattā gacchanti duggatiṃ.
22. Nirayavaggo.319: Vajjañca vajjato ñatvā, avajjañca avajjato;\nSammādiṭṭhisamādānā, sattā gacchanti suggatiṃ.\nNirayavaggo dvāvīsatimo niṭṭhito.

23. Nāgavaggo.320: Ahaṃ nāgova saṅgāme, cāpato patitaṃ saraṃ;\nAtivākyaṃ titikkhissaṃ, dussīlo hi bahujjano.
23. Nāgavaggo.321: Dantaṃ nayanti samitiṃ, dantaṃ rājābhirūhati;\nDanto seṭṭho manussesu, yotivākyaṃ titikkhati.
23. Nāgavaggo.322: Varamassatarā dantā, ājānīyā ca [ājānīyāva (syā.)] sindhavā;\nKuñjarā ca [kuñjarāva (syā.)] mahānāgā, attadanto tato varaṃ.
23. Nāgavaggo.323: Na hi etehi yānehi, gaccheyya agataṃ disaṃ;\nYathāttanā sudantena, danto dantena gacchati.
23. Nāgavaggo.324: Dhanapālo [dhanapālako (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)] nāma kuñjaro, kaṭukabhedano [kaṭukappabhedano (sī. syā. pī.)] dunnivārayo;\nBaddho kabaḷaṃ na bhuñjati, sumarati [susarati (ka.)] nāgavanassa kuñjaro.
23. Nāgavaggo.325: Middhī yadā hoti mahagghaso ca, niddāyitā samparivattasāyī;\nMahāvarāhova nivāpapuṭṭho, punappunaṃ gabbhamupeti mando.
23. Nāgavaggo.326: Idaṃ pure cittamacāri cārikaṃ, yenicchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ;\nTadajjahaṃ niggahessāmi yoniso, hatthippabhinnaṃ viya aṅkusaggaho.
23. Nāgavaggo.327: Appamādaratā hotha, sacittamanurakkhatha;\nDuggā uddharathattānaṃ, paṅke sannova [sattova (sī. pī.)] kuñjaro.
23. Nāgavaggo.328: Sace labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;\nAbhibhuyya sabbāni parissayāni, careyya tenattamano satīmā.
23. Nāgavaggo.329: No ce labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;\nRājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāya, eko care mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo.
23. Nāgavaggo.330: Ekassa caritaṃ seyyo, natthi bāle sahāyatā;\nEko care na ca pāpāni kayirā, appossukko mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo.
23. Nāgavaggo.331: Atthamhi jātamhi sukhā sahāyā, tuṭṭhī sukhā yā itarītarena;\nPuññaṃ sukhaṃ jīvitasaṅkhayamhi, sabbassa dukkhassa sukhaṃ pahānaṃ.
23. Nāgavaggo.332: Sukhā matteyyatā loke, atho petteyyatā sukhā;\nSukhā sāmaññatā loke, atho brahmaññatā sukhā.
23. Nāgavaggo.333: Sukhaṃ yāva jarā sīlaṃ, sukhā saddhā patiṭṭhitā;\nSukho paññāya paṭilābho, pāpānaṃ akaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ.\nNāgavaggo tevīsatimo niṭṭhito.

24. Taṇhāvaggo.334: Manujassa pamattacārino, taṇhā vaḍḍhati māluvā viya;\nSo plavatī [plavati (sī. pī.), palavetī (ka.), uplavati (?)] hurā huraṃ, phalamicchaṃva vanasmi vānaro.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.335: Yaṃ esā sahate jammī, taṇhā loke visattikā;\nSokā tassa pavaḍḍhanti, abhivaṭṭhaṃva [abhivaḍḍhaṃva (syā.), abhivaṭṭaṃva (pī.), abhivuḍḍhaṃva (ka.)] bīraṇaṃ.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.336: Yo cetaṃ sahate jammiṃ, taṇhaṃ loke duraccayaṃ;\nSokā tamhā papatanti, udabinduva pokkharā.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.337: Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddaṃ vo, yāvantettha samāgatā;\nTaṇhāya mūlaṃ khaṇatha, usīratthova bīraṇaṃ;\nMā vo naḷaṃva sotova, māro bhañji punappunaṃ.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.338: Yathāpi mūle anupaddave daḷhe, chinnopi rukkho punareva rūhati;\nEvampi taṇhānusaye anūhate, nibbattatī dukkhamidaṃ punappunaṃ.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.339: Yassa chattiṃsati sotā, manāpasavanā bhusā;\nMāhā [vāhā (sī. syā. pī.)] vahanti duddiṭṭhiṃ, saṅkappā rāganissitā.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.340: Savanti sabbadhi sotā, latā uppajja [ubbhijja (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)] tiṭṭhati;\nTañca disvā lataṃ jātaṃ, mūlaṃ paññāya chindatha.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.341: Saritāni sinehitāni ca, somanassāni bhavanti jantuno;\nTe sātasitā sukhesino, te ve jātijarūpagā narā.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.342: Tasiṇāya purakkhatā pajā, parisappanti sasova bandhito [bādhito (bahūsu)];\nSaṃyojanasaṅgasattakā, dukkhamupenti punappunaṃ cirāya.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.343: Tasiṇāya purakkhatā pajā, parisappanti sasova bandhito;\nTasmā tasiṇaṃ vinodaye, ākaṅkhanta [bhikkhū ākaṅkhī (sī.), bhikkhu ākaṅkhaṃ (syā.)] virāgamattano.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.344: Yo nibbanatho vanādhimutto, vanamutto vanameva dhāvati;\nTaṃ puggalametha passatha, mutto bandhanameva dhāvati.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.345: Na taṃ daḷhaṃ bandhanamāhu dhīrā, yadāyasaṃ dārujapabbajañca [dārūjaṃ babbajañca (sī. pī.)];\nSārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu, puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.346: Etaṃ daḷhaṃ bandhanamāhu dhīrā, ohārinaṃ sithilaṃ duppamuñcaṃ;\nEtampi chetvāna paribbajanti, anapekkhino kāmasukhaṃ pahāya.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.347: Ye rāgarattānupatanti sotaṃ, sayaṃkataṃ makkaṭakova jālaṃ;\nEtampi chetvāna vajanti dhīrā, anapekkhino sabbadukkhaṃ pahāya.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.348: Muñca pure muñca pacchato, majjhe muñca bhavassa pāragū;\nSabbattha vimuttamānaso, na punaṃ jātijaraṃ upehisi.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.349: Vitakkamathitassa jantuno, tibbarāgassa subhānupassino;\nBhiyyo taṇhā pavaḍḍhati, esa kho daḷhaṃ [esa gāḷhaṃ (ka.)] karoti bandhanaṃ.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.350: Vitakkūpasame ca [vitakkūpasameva (ka.)] yo rato, asubhaṃ bhāvayate sadā sato;\nEsa [eso (?)] kho byanti kāhiti, esa [eso (?)] checchati mārabandhanaṃ.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.351: Niṭṭhaṅgato asantāsī, vītataṇho anaṅgaṇo;\nAcchindi bhavasallāni, antimoyaṃ samussayo.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.352: Vītataṇho anādāno, niruttipadakovido;\nAkkharānaṃ sannipātaṃ, jaññā pubbāparāni ca;\nSa ve ‘‘antimasārīro, mahāpañño mahāpuriso’’ti vuccati.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.353: Sabbābhibhū sabbavidūhamasmi, sabbesu dhammesu anūpalitto;\nSabbañjaho taṇhakkhaye vimutto, sayaṃ abhiññāya kamuddiseyyaṃ.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.354: Sabbadānaṃ dhammadānaṃ jināti, sabbarasaṃ dhammaraso jināti;\nSabbaratiṃ dhammarati jināti, taṇhakkhayo sabbadukkhaṃ jināti.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.355: Hananti bhogā dummedhaṃ, no ca pāragavesino;\nBhogataṇhāya dummedho, hanti aññeva attanaṃ.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.356: Tiṇadosāni khettāni, rāgadosā ayaṃ pajā;\nTasmā hi vītarāgesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.357: Tiṇadosāni khettāni, dosadosā ayaṃ pajā;\nTasmā hi vītadosesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
24. Taṇhāvaggo.358: Tiṇadosāni khettāni, mohadosā ayaṃ pajā;\nTasmā hi vītamohesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.

25. Bhikkhuvaggo.360: Cakkhunā saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu sotena saṃvaro;\nGhānena saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu jivhāya saṃvaro.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.361: Kāyena saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu vācāya saṃvaro;\nManasā saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu sabbattha saṃvaro;\nSabbattha saṃvuto bhikkhu, sabbadukkhā pamuccati.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.362: Hatthasaṃyato pādasaṃyato, vācāsaṃyato saṃyatuttamo;\nAjjhattarato samāhito, eko santusito tamāhu bhikkhuṃ.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.363: Yo mukhasaṃyato bhikkhu, mantabhāṇī anuddhato;\nAtthaṃ dhammañca dīpeti, madhuraṃ tassa bhāsitaṃ.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.364: Dhammārāmo dhammarato, dhammaṃ anuvicintayaṃ;\nDhammaṃ anussaraṃ bhikkhu, saddhammā na parihāyati.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.365: Salābhaṃ nātimaññeyya, nāññesaṃ pihayaṃ care;\nAññesaṃ pihayaṃ bhikkhu, samādhiṃ nādhigacchati.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.366: Appalābhopi ce bhikkhu, salābhaṃ nātimaññati;\nTaṃ ve devā pasaṃsanti, suddhājīviṃ atanditaṃ.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.367: Sabbaso nāmarūpasmiṃ, yassa natthi mamāyitaṃ;\nAsatā ca na socati, sa ve ‘‘bhikkhū’’ti vuccati.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.368: Mettāvihārī yo bhikkhu, pasanno buddhasāsane;\nAdhigacche padaṃ santaṃ, saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukhaṃ.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.369: Siñca bhikkhu imaṃ nāvaṃ, sittā te lahumessati;\nChetvā rāgañca dosañca, tato nibbānamehisi.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.370: Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;\nPañca saṅgātigo bhikkhu, ‘‘oghatiṇṇo’’ti vuccati.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.371: Jhāya bhikkhu [jhāya tuvaṃ bhikkhu (?)] mā pamādo [mā ca pamādo (sī. syā. pī.)], mā te kāmaguṇe ramessu [bhamassu (sī. pī.), bhavassu (syā.), ramassu (ka.)] cittaṃ;\nMā lohaguḷaṃ gilī pamatto, mā kandi ‘‘dukkhamida’’nti ḍayhamāno.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.372: Natthi jhānaṃ apaññassa, paññā natthi ajhāyato [ajjhāyino (ka.)];\nYamhi jhānañca paññā ca, sa ve nibbānasantike.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.373: Suññāgāraṃ paviṭṭhassa, santacittassa bhikkhuno;\nAmānusī rati hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.374: Yato yato sammasati, khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ;\nLabhatī [labhati (pī.), labhate (ka.)] pītipāmojjaṃ, amataṃ taṃ vijānataṃ.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.375: Tatrāyamādi bhavati, idha paññassa bhikkhuno;\nIndriyagutti santuṭṭhi, pātimokkhe ca saṃvaro.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.376: Mitte bhajassu kalyāṇe, suddhājīve atandite;\nPaṭisanthāravutyassa [paṭisandhāravutyassa (ka.)], ācārakusalo siyā;\nTato pāmojjabahulo, dukkhassantaṃ karissati.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.377: Vassikā viya pupphāni, maddavāni [majjavāni (ka. ṭīkā) paccavāni (ka. aṭṭha.)] pamuñcati;\nEvaṃ rāgañca dosañca, vippamuñcetha bhikkhavo.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.378: Santakāyo santavāco, santavā susamāhito [santamano susamāhito (syā. pī.), santamano samāhito (ka.)];\nVantalokāmiso bhikkhu, ‘‘upasanto’’ti vuccati.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.379: Attanā codayattānaṃ, paṭimaṃsetha attanā [paṭimāse attamattanā (sī. pī.), paṭimaṃse tamattanā (syā.)];\nSo attagutto satimā, sukhaṃ bhikkhu vihāhisi.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.380: Attā hi attano nātho, (ko hi nātho paro siyā) [( ) videsapotthakesu natthi]\nAttā hi attano gati;\nTasmā saṃyamamattānaṃ [saṃyamaya’ttānaṃ (sī. pī.)], assaṃ bhadraṃva vāṇijo.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.381: Pāmojjabahulo bhikkhu, pasanno buddhasāsane;\nAdhigacche padaṃ santaṃ, saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukhaṃ.
25. Bhikkhuvaggo.382: Yo have daharo bhikkhu, yuñjati buddhasāsane;\nSomaṃ [so imaṃ (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)] lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā.\nBhikkhuvaggo pañcavīsatimo niṭṭhito.

26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.383: Chinda sotaṃ parakkamma, kāme panuda brāhmaṇa;\nSaṅkhārānaṃ khayaṃ ñatvā, akataññūsi brāhmaṇa.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.384: Yadā dvayesu dhammesu, pāragū hoti brāhmaṇo;\nAthassa sabbe saṃyogā, atthaṃ gacchanti jānato.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.385: Yassa pāraṃ apāraṃ vā, pārāpāraṃ na vijjati;\nVītaddaraṃ visaṃyuttaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.387: Divā tapati ādicco, rattimābhāti candimā;\nSannaddho khattiyo tapati, jhāyī tapati brāhmaṇo;\nAtha sabbamahorattiṃ [sabbamahorattaṃ (?)], buddho tapati tejasā.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.388: Bāhitapāpoti brāhmaṇo, samacariyā samaṇoti vuccati;\nPabbājayamattano malaṃ, tasmā ‘‘pabbajito’’ti vuccati.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.389: Na brāhmaṇassa pahareyya, nāssa muñcetha brāhmaṇo;\nDhī [dhi (syā. byākaraṇesu)] brāhmaṇassa hantāraṃ, tato dhī yassa [yo + assa = yassa] muñcati.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.390: Na brāhmaṇassetadakiñci seyyo, yadā nisedho manaso piyehi;\nYato yato hiṃsamano nivattati, tato tato sammatimeva dukkhaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.391: Yassa kāyena vācāya, manasā natthi dukkaṭaṃ;\nSaṃvutaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.392: Yamhā dhammaṃ vijāneyya, sammāsambuddhadesitaṃ;\nSakkaccaṃ taṃ namasseyya, aggihuttaṃva brāhmaṇo.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.393: Na jaṭāhi na gottena, na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo;\nYamhi saccañca dhammo ca, so sucī so ca brāhmaṇo.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.394: Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;\nAbbhantaraṃ te gahanaṃ, bāhiraṃ parimajjasi.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.395: Paṃsukūladharaṃ jantuṃ, kisaṃ dhamanisanthataṃ;\nEkaṃ vanasmiṃ jhāyantaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.396: Na cāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūmi, yonijaṃ mattisambhavaṃ;\nBhovādi nāma so hoti, sace hoti sakiñcano;\nAkiñcanaṃ anādānaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.397: Sabbasaṃyojanaṃ chetvā, yo ve na paritassati;\nSaṅgātigaṃ visaṃyuttaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.398: Chetvā naddhiṃ [nandhiṃ (ka. sī.), nandiṃ (pī.)] varattañca, sandānaṃ [sandāmaṃ (sī.)] sahanukkamaṃ;\nUkkhittapalighaṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.399: Akkosaṃ vadhabandhañca, aduṭṭho yo titikkhati;\nKhantībalaṃ balānīkaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.400: Akkodhanaṃ vatavantaṃ, sīlavantaṃ anussadaṃ;\nDantaṃ antimasārīraṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.401: Vāri pokkharapatteva, āraggeriva sāsapo;\nYo na limpati [lippati (sī. pī.)] kāmesu, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.402: Yo dukkhassa pajānāti, idheva khayamattano;\nPannabhāraṃ visaṃyuttaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.403: Gambhīrapaññaṃ medhāviṃ, maggāmaggassa kovidaṃ;\nUttamatthamanuppattaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.404: Asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ gahaṭṭhehi, anāgārehi cūbhayaṃ;\nAnokasārimappicchaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.405: Nidhāya daṇḍaṃ bhūtesu, tasesu thāvaresu ca;\nYo na hanti na ghāteti, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.406: Aviruddhaṃ viruddhesu, attadaṇḍesu nibbutaṃ;\nSādānesu anādānaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.407: Yassa rāgo ca doso ca, māno makkho ca pātito;\nSāsaporiva āraggā [āragge (ka.)], tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.408: Akakkasaṃ viññāpaniṃ, giraṃ saccamudīraye;\nYāya nābhisaje kañci [kiñci (ka.)], tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.409: Yodha dīghaṃ va rassaṃ vā, aṇuṃ thūlaṃ subhāsubhaṃ;\nLoke adinnaṃ nādiyati [nādeti (ma. ni. 2.459)], tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.410: Āsā yassa na vijjanti, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca;\nNirāsāsaṃ [nirāsayaṃ (sī. syā. pī.), nirāsakaṃ (?)] visaṃyuttaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.411: Yassālayā na vijjanti, aññāya akathaṃkathī;\nAmatogadhamanuppattaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.412: Yodha puññañca pāpañca, ubho saṅgamupaccagā;\nAsokaṃ virajaṃ suddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.413: Candaṃva vimalaṃ suddhaṃ, vippasannamanāvilaṃ;\nNandībhavaparikkhīṇaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.414: Yomaṃ [yo imaṃ (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)] palipathaṃ duggaṃ, saṃsāraṃ mohamaccagā;\nTiṇṇo pāragato [pāragato (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)] jhāyī, anejo akathaṃkathī;\nAnupādāya nibbuto, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.415: Yodha kāme pahantvāna [pahatvāna (sī. pī.)], anāgāro paribbaje;\nKāmabhavaparikkhīṇaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ [idaṃ gāthādvayaṃ videsapotthakesu sakideva dassitaṃ].
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.416: Yodha taṇhaṃ pahantvāna, anāgāro paribbaje;\nTaṇhābhavaparikkhīṇaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.417: Hitvā mānusakaṃ yogaṃ, dibbaṃ yogaṃ upaccagā;\nSabbayogavisaṃyuttaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.418: Hitvā ratiñca aratiñca, sītibhūtaṃ nirūpadhiṃ;\nSabbalokābhibhuṃ vīraṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.419: Cutiṃ yo vedi sattānaṃ, upapattiñca sabbaso;\nAsattaṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.420: Yassa gatiṃ na jānanti, devā gandhabbamānusā;\nKhīṇāsavaṃ arahantaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.421: Yassa pure ca pacchā ca, majjhe ca natthi kiñcanaṃ;\nAkiñcanaṃ anādānaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.422: Usabhaṃ pavaraṃ vīraṃ, mahesiṃ vijitāvinaṃ;\nAnejaṃ nhātakaṃ [nahātakaṃ (sī. syā. kaṃ pī.)] buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
26. Brāhmaṇavaggo.423:
Pubbenivāsaṃ yo vedi, saggāpāyañca passati,
Atho jātikkhayaṃ patto, abhiññāvosito muni;
Sabbavositavosānaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
Brāhmaṇavaggo chabbīsatimo niṭṭhito.
